title: Blended Teaching Method Design for Distance Language Learning: Enhancing Preservice Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and elementary-level target language comprehension
context.additional_context: Blended instruction optimized for learners over 40 with technological constraints, aiming to strengthen language competencies required for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain language learning material adaptation strategies in remote environments and apply them to actual classes.
Learners enhance writing and speaking proficiency in the target language through asynchronous activities on a Learning Management System (LMS).
Learners design and present blended teaching method application cases through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
